definition: to rack one's brains for schemes (idiom)/to beat one's brains out
to cost/to spend/fee/wasteful/expenses
surname Fei
to use up/to exhaust/to end/to finish/to the utmost/exhausted/finished/to the limit (of sth)/all/entirely
to the greatest extent/(when used before a noun of location) furthest or extreme/to be within the limits of/to give priority to
heart/mind/intention/center/core/CL:顆|颗[ke1],個|个[ge4]
machine/engine/opportunity/intention/aircraft/pivot/crucial point/flexible (quick-witted)/organic/CL:臺|台[tai2]
surname Ji

sentences.english: With a period of only thee weeks, five prisoners succeeded in escaping from the prison.
sentences.chinese: 那囚犯费尽心机找一个越狱的办法，他终于成功了。

sentences.english: You and all your classmates have struggled to get jobs since graduation.
sentences.chinese: 毕业后您和您所有的同学都为求职费尽心机。

sentences.english: Others are trying their best to approach teachers in order to find out some examination questions.
sentences.chinese: 有人费尽心机地接近老师，为了套出些考题。

sentences.english: This is the painting which he worried out.
sentences.chinese: 这就是他费尽心机搞到手的那幅油画。

sentences.english: Then one day, you will find that the things you try hard to forget are already one.
sentences.chinese: 原本是费尽心机想要忘记的事情真的就那么忘记了。

sentences.english: You tried to teach me right from wrong .
sentences.chinese: 您费尽心机学人是非分明。

sentences.english: So finally photographed the wall of the banana.
sentences.chinese: 于是费尽心机拍到了围墙外的香蕉树。

to plot actively (idiom)/scheming/calculating
to take a lot of trouble (idiom); painstaking/at the cost of a lot of effort
to make painstaking efforts (idiom); after much trouble/to work hard at sth
to suffer untold hardships (idiom); trials and tribulations/with difficulty/after some effort
lit. thousand ways, a hundred plans (idiom); by every possible means
to dig for thoughts (idiom); to search everything for an answer/to rack one's brains
to think up every possible method (idiom); to devise ways and means/to try this, that and the other
to take great pains/to go to a lot of trouble
to rack one's brains
in the end/finally/as a result
not stint/not spare/not hesitate (to do sth)/not scruple (to do sth)
committing all manner of crimes/completely unscrupulous
pinyin: wu2 suo3 bu4 yong4 qi2 ji2

definition: brains
to reckon/to calculate/to plan/to expect/to scheme
painstaking effort/to take a lot of trouble/laborious at pains
